headline: Duke Energy Foundation donates $350,000 to community organizations assisting in Hurricane Milton relief
summary: Today, the Duke Energy Foundation announced an additional $350,000 to Florida nonprofit organizations as part of its ongoing response to Hurricane Milton, disaster preparedness and relief. It has been more than a month since Milton made landfall as a major Category 3 storm on Oct. 9, and the company remains committed to communities as they rebuild.

raw.headline: Duke Energy Foundation donates $350,000 to community organizations assisting in Hurricane Milton relief

headline: North Carolina microgrid EV charging hub is a model for fleet electrification, Duke Energy says
summary: The charging hub can serve light-, medium- and heavy-duty electric fleet vehicles with 100% renewable energy from Duke’s integrated microgrid.
